name: itk-io-scanco-app
description: Convert and calibrate Scanco microCT volume .isq and .aim files.

scripts.copyShoelaceAssets: shx mkdir -p public/shoelace && shx cp -r node_modules/@shoelace-style/shoelace/dist/assets public/
scripts.build: npm run copyShoelaceAssets && vite -c vite.config.js build

author: Matt McCormick <matt.mccormick@kitware.com>
